Text: can you explain why this keeps crashing?
can anyone seriously help me out, it crashes immediately on startup, I have put it in compatibility mode, run as administrator, I mean come on.
It doesn't even show any error messages? For me it's working fine on Windows 7 x64 Home Premium.
Can you get Fahrenheit from gog?
its strange, its completely the hd part, because regular version works just fine, but if I install this or download the hd patch and install that to the regular it just crashes, I cant solve it.
I got a fix for people, if it crashes at startup, lower your resolution. I had to lower the resolution from x1600 to 1200. hope it helps anyone.
